boolean.name: isLoginUserQrcodeEnabled
boolean.title: Use qrCode for user connection
boolean.help: Allows users to fill in the username field on the login page with the qr code present on the user's form view.

boolean.name: manageCarrierOption
boolean.title: Manage carrier option
boolean.help: Allow users to manage carrier option for customer deliveries.

boolean.name: isCustomerDeliveryLineAdditionEnabled
boolean.title: Enable addition of new lines in customer delivery.

boolean.name: isSupplierArrivalLineAdditionEnabled
boolean.title: Enable addition of new lines in supplier arrival.

string.name: minimalRequiredMobileAppVersion
string.title: Minimal required version of the mobile application.
string.help: Indicates the minimal required version of the mobile application. If the user's version is different than the one indicated, the mobile app will require the user to update to have access to the app.

boolean.name: isTrackerMessageEnabled
boolean.title: Enable tracker messages.
boolean.help: Enabling this setting, allows you to see on the mobile application the comments and changes that are tracked on the web application.

boolean.name: isVerifyCustomerDeliveryLineEnabled
boolean.title: Enable line verification on customer deliveries

boolean.name: isVerifySupplierArrivalLineEnabled
boolean.title: Enable line verification on supplier arrivals

boolean.name: isVerifyInternalMoveLineEnabled
boolean.title: Enable line verification on internal moves
